entry.title: Thursday night: A few showers. Low plus 3.

entry.title: Friday: A few showers. High 17.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. A few showers beginning late in the afternoon. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late in the morning. Wind becoming east 20 in the afternoon. High 17. UV index 8 or very high. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Thursday 20 April 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of showers. Low 8. POP 40%
